pages.text: Search this site Embedded Files Skip to main content Skip to navigation LIFTING NOODLES RAMEN Welcome Lifting Noodles Ramen, your favorite neighborhood ramen shop ORDER ONLINE Our story, founders, and locations OUR STORY Lifiting Noodles is best known for their traditional ramen with a twist. Lifting Noodles opened its original flagship location inside the We Suki Suki food hall in East Atlanta Village January of 2018. Lifting Noodles started with the simple mission of being the best ramen in the city and quickly became one of the cities favorite ramen shops! OUR FOUNDERS Lifting Noodles ’s leadership team is led by Lifting Noodle ’s two founding partners, Seven Chan and Ken Yu. Seven Chan is a lifetime entrepreneur with almost 20 years of experience building and running successful companies. His specialties include business strategy, development, social media, press and marketing. Ken Yu has over 20 years of restaurant experience working in business startup, logistics, quality assurance and food safety. Since opening Lifting Noodles the pair have gone on to win multiple awards for their business acumen and contributions to their city and have been featured on Entrepreneurial Chef, Food Network, Restaurant Unstoppable, Forbes, US Weekly and more. The pair has also parlayed the success of Lifting Noodles into the launch of KSP Restaurant Group which includes Lifting Noodles, the pairs other food concepts and franchising company. CURRENT LOCATIONS lifting noodles EAST ATLANTA VILLAGE The original Lifting Noodles located in East Atlanta Village opened January 2018 inside the We Suki Suki Food Hall. Small but mighty our original location still ranks as one of the highest rated ramen restaurants in the city. CLICK FOR STORE DETAILS ORDER ONLINE lifting noodles DULUTH Lifting Noodles Duluth opened in the center of downtown Duluth inside the Sweet Octopus food hall in 2020. CLICK FOR STORE DETAILS ORDER ONLINE lifting noodles BATTERY Lifting Noodles opened in 2020 inside the PH'EAST Food Hall located inside Atlanta's famous Battery At Braves Stadium. CLICK FOR STORE DETAILS ORDER ONLINE lifting noodles PHILLY NOW OPEN! Lifting Noodles is located in the heart of Philly off 10th street! CLICK HERE FOR STORE DETAILS ORDER ONLINE lifting noodles Charleston Lifting Noodles Charleston is our first location in South Carolina, located inside the Historic Victory Building in West Ashley.
